mapper.select: select blog_browe_id, client_platform, client_user_agent, client_browse_platform, client_browse_name, client_browse_version, client_browse_ip, client_browse_city, client_browse_app_and_pc, client_browse_url, create_time from blog_blogbrowe where blog_browe_id = #{blogBroweId}
select count(*) from blog_blogbrowe where DATEDIFF(NOW(),create_time)=#{dayNum}
select count(*) from blog_blogbrowe where client_browse_city like concat(concat('%', #{clientBrowseCity}), '%')
select count(*) from blog_blogbrowe where to_days(create_time) = to_days(now())
select count(*) from blog_blogbrowe where YEAR(create_time)=YEAR(NOW())
select count(*) from blog_blogbrowe where DATEDIFF(create_time,NOW())=-1
select count(*) from blog_blogbrowe where PERIOD_DIFF(date_format(now(),"%Y%m") , date_format(create_time,"%Y%m")) =1
select count(*) from blog_blogbrowe where year(create_time)=year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year));
